meanings.definition: The act of emitting or sending out
meanings.sent1: The emittance of light from the sun brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The emittance of sound from the speaker filled the hall.
meanings.sent3: The emittance of bubbles from the fish tank made the cat curious.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an emittance of joy that lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The emittance of warmth from the fireplace made the cozy cabin even more inviting.

meanings.definition: The amount of radiant energy emitted by a surface
meanings.sent1: The emittance of heat from the stove kept the soup warm.
meanings.sent2: The emittance of light from the lamp illuminated the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The emittance of giggles from the children filled the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The emittance of love from her heart enveloped everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The emittance of music from the piano filled the concert hall with melody.
